channel.title: Comments on: Innovate!2010 – Web2Ireland community call to action – deadline March 1st

item.title: By: Mike Sigal
item.dc:creator: Mike Sigal
item.description:
Thanks for posting Fergus. A quick update:
Thanks to some new sponsors, prizes now exceed 1M Euros, including $1M in development services and 2 prizes of 20K GBP in seed funding.
Best,
Mike
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for posting Fergus. A quick update:

Thanks to some new sponsors, prizes now exceed 1M Euros, including $1M in development services and 2 prizes of 20K GBP in seed funding.

Best,

Mike
